favourites.title: Dune
favourites.description:
Ads suck. Hide ads with  VIP.
RELEASEDOctober 21, 2021 + 88 moreDVDJanuary 11, 2022RUNTIME2h 35mDIRECTORDenis VilleneuveWRITERSEric Roth (screenplay) + 3 moreCOUNTRYUnited StatesLANGUAGESChinese, EnglishSTUDIOLegendary EntertainmentGENRESScience Fiction, Adventure
It begins.
Paul Atreides, a brilliant and gifted young man born into a great destiny beyond his understanding, must travel to the most dangerous planet in the universe to ensure the future of his family and his people. As malevolent forces explode into conflict over the planet's exclusive supply of the most precious resource in existence-a commodity capable of unlocking humanity's greatest potential-only those who can conquer their fear will survive.

Sentiment
Trakt Community
Generated from popular comments on Dune.

Visually and technically stunning masterpiece

Epic world-building and atmosphere captivates viewers

Hans Zimmer's soundtrack perfectly enhances the experience

Excellent faithful adaptation of beloved source material

Excessively slow pacing makes it boring

Feels incomplete as just setup for sequel

Characters lack emotional depth and development

Story is confusing and hard to follow

favourites.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King (Extended)
favourites.description:
Ads suck. Hide ads with  VIP.
RELEASEDDecember 17, 2003 + 1 moreRUNTIME4h 24mDIRECTORPeter JacksonWRITERSPeter Jackson + 3 moreCOUNTRYUnited StatesLANGUAGESEnglishGENRESAction, Adventure, Fantasy
The eye of the enemy is moving.
Aragorn is revealed as the heir to the ancient kings as he, Gandalf and the other members of the broken fellowship struggle to save Gondor from Sauron's forces. Meanwhile, Frodo and Sam bring the ring closer to the heart of Mordor, the dark lord's realm.

favourites.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers (Extended)
favourites.description:
Ads suck. Hide ads with  VIP.
RELEASEDDecember 18, 2002RUNTIME3h 56mDIRECTORPeter JacksonWRITERSPeter Jackson (screenplay) + 3 moreCOUNTRYUnited StatesLANGUAGESEnglishGENRESAction, Adventure, Fantasy
A New Power Is Rising.
Frodo and Sam are trekking to Mordor to destroy the One Ring of Power while Gimli, Legolas and Aragorn search for the orc-captured Merry and Pippin. All along, nefarious wizard Saruman awaits the Fellowship members at the Orthanc Tower in Isengard.

favourites.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (Extended)
favourites.description:
Ads suck. Hide ads with  VIP.
RELEASEDDecember 19, 2001RUNTIME3h 48mCOUNTRYUnited StatesLANGUAGESEnglishGENRESAdventure, Fantasy, Action
One ring to rule them all
Assisted by a Fellowship of heroes, Frodo Baggins plunges into a perilous trek to take the mystical One Ring to Mount Doom so that it and its magical powers can be destroyed and never possessed by evil Lord Sauron. The astonishing journey begins in the first film of director/co-writer Peter Jackson's epic trilogy that redefined fantasy film making. This imaginative foray into J.R.R. Tolkien's Middle-earth won 4 Academy Awards and earned 13 total nominations, including best picture.
